Reviews.Title: Great TV for Price
Reviews.Author: P. Bitar "Bitar"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for $148. It is a good TV for the kitchen.Vizio has a great picture and good stand alone sound if you do not intend to hook this TV to a sound system/bar. I have a 46" Samsung and while the picture is great, the sound is very disappointing, unusable without hooking it up to a home audio system. I have a 42" Vizio and it sounds fine.This TV is 720p/1080i (not 1080p) but you cannot tell at this size. This picture is great, very crisp, clear and vivid.When we bought it right out of the box we thought it had a speaker problem. We had to turn the balance all the way to the left. We asked for a return and as we liked the TV picture so much we asked for another (by the way Amazon gave us 30 days to return while shipping the new TV in 2 days). The second TV also had the same speaker issue or so we thought. After moving it to the bedroom, it did not have a speaker issue. After changing cords and eliminating causes we found it to be a problem with the Directv device. Reset the Directv box and the speaker issue was gone on both TV's.Now we loved the TV's so much, we cancelled the return and paid for the second one.Warning: E191va comes with only 1 (one) HDMI port, if you need two you want the E190VA.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: A. Halfon
Reviews.Content: I bought this set after reading the reviews. I  worried about the setup and the sound after reading about problems others had. I recieved the set about a week ago and my experience has been GREAT. I set up the stand after reading the instructions in about two minutes. What is the problem. The sound is very good and i have set it at 35% of available and can hear it clearly with and without my hearing aid. The picture is sharp, clear, and without distortion. I have a cable hookup so I use the cable companies remote with no problems. Glad i bought this set.

Reviews.Title: very nice affordable TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: as a senior citizen I wondered if this would be beyond my tech savvy-ness but there are detailed drawings that accompany the quick set-up directions. Yes the audio quality does not compare to my previous ancient stereo console unit but I can plug in speakers later ... even head phones! I also love the capability of hooking this to my computer or hitching up a flashdrive with pictures on it to have a slide show. Both the latter will require separate cord purchases but they're inexpensive and easy to find.It took me less than 15 minutes from opening the box to having it in place and operating.I only gave it 4 stars because I haven't had it long enough yet to say it's perfection on a stand. I'VE SAVED THE BEST FOR LAST: if you by any chance need to contact tech support the call will get answered in 5 minutes by someone in the United States. (My call was to a woman in Utah who knew her stuff and had me up and re-running within about 30 seconds.)So, may I be so bold as to say BUY THIS PRODUCT!

Reviews.Title: Good Vacation TV/Laptop Monitor
Reviews.Author: R. J. Walters
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to be used as a travel TV for those hotels that still have non-CC units even after all these years.  It is very light (8 lbs) and easily fits into the recessed part of my car trunk. First of all I don't understand at all the previous reviewer stating it took multiple people to install the base. I am a 150 lb senior citizen and it snapped together quite easily for me. Maybe the other reviewer was assembly challenged :-)This is my second Vizio. It is top quality and has a great picture. Since I am deaf I can't say anything about the sound.I will also be using it as a computer monitor for my Apple laptop. Haven't tried that yet as I haven't received the VGA cable yet (coming tomorrow).

Reviews.Title: Nice except the poor speakers make speech hard to understand
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this Vizio and a similar Samsung UN22D5003 TV within 2 weeks as 2 of our old small TVs quit.Recommendation:  Samsung UN22D5003 22" is better unless you need it fit between upper and lower kitchen cabinets.1. Vizio:  The case design is great for fitting between upper and lower cabinets in the kitchen.2. Vizio:  The menu design is excellent, better than Samsung . . easy to find and operate all settings.3. Samsung: Better built-in speakers plus Analog and Digital audio output . .  missing on Vizio.4. Samsung: Slightly better picture quality, but not as important as other differences.Vizio . . The picture quality is great.  The on-screen menus are easier to use than most.  We tried it with a "plain old analog signal" modulated from our Dish Satellite receiver for secondary TV's.  With the TV in ZOOM mode, the picture filled the screen with almost no cropping and no noticable stretching . . and the overall picture quality was good for a plain old analog TV signal.I am only down-rating this TV because of the fairly-poor audio quality.  You may think the audio is OK if you don't do side-by-side comparison to other similar TVs.  We are not looking for high fidelity of course, but the audio has a hollow resonance that makes speech less clear than it should be. Pickup your coffee cup and talk straight into it. Its not really as bad has talking into your coffee cup, but the speaker installation was not designed to dampen backside resonance from inside the case.We watched a 1 hour drama last night where the audio production was good, but parts of the dialog were a little hard to understand because of the speakers.  Bummer.  Even newscasts are a little muddy where microphones are ideally positioned on the TV personalities.Its ironic the TV has all sorts of audio enhancements in its Menu and then fails to pay better attention to  speaker performance.

Reviews.Title: Very High Value
Reviews.Author: S. Murphy "SuperSaver"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 19" version (E191VA) and I am quite happy. Got a Roku LT to go with it.I use this in my bedroom. It is very easy to transport so I will bring it into the living room as well. Picks up many of my OTA local channels using just a paper clip. Comes in high definition with great sound as well.Speaking of sound, this TV is loud. Which is a good thing because I did not want to purchase extra speakers or a sound bar.One feature I enjoy is the back button. Not only does it work between channels, but also between inputs. Therefore I can watch the Roku and easily switch to live TV and back again.For the cost of this TV, I am very very happy. It does everything that I wanted it to do, takes up little space, has loud volume, clear picture, and very efficient power consumption (also has an auto-off timer). As a bonus: TV remains very cool to the touch even after hours of use. No extra heat equals no wasted energy.The only thing lacking is a longer power cord. Cord is too short by at least one foot.

Reviews.Title: Used in a small room
Reviews.Author: MizLiz "MizLiz"
Reviews.Content: I wrote the review below after having the TV for a few days.  I've had it now for just a little over a month and thought I would update. The only issue I have is the delay when turning on the TV or changing channels.  When I turn the TV on there's about an 8 second delay before sound or picture appear, enough time to make one think the "on" button didn't work and you tend to press it again (turning it off).  Changing channels is not much better with a 4-5 second delay.  Once I adjusted myself to that annoyance (the TV won't certainly adjust to me), I appreciate the good quality sound and picture...and the price.I read the comments about poor sound quality but decided to get it anyway.  I use it in a small craft room and the sound quality is just fine.  Perhaps this TV is suited for smaller areas.  I wouldn't hesitate to buy another.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 19-inch TV
Reviews.Author: Edwin Weber
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for only a day but I am satisifed with it.  It has better sound than most small TVs and a good picture.  Only the quick start guide is included in the box, so I suggest that you go to the Vizio web site and download the full instructions.  There is much valuable information but it has 45 pages so you might not want to print it.  It has much better instructions for installing the base than the quick start guide.There are two audio output ports.  The green port on the back of the set will work only if the set is being used with a PC.  The second port is on the left side above the USB port. If you want to add headphones or external speakers, the port of the side is the one to use.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: AllieCat
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv from amazon, was delivered in just two days!  Setup was a breeze.  The only problem we came across was the remote didn't work.  Luckily, vizio support (american based) was super helpful and sent me a new remote within a week.  Would have given it 5 stars, but the dud remote knocks off a star.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: the_real_timmer
Reviews.Content: We bought this so my wife can do her exercise DVDs and watch the TV in her office. No complaints whatsoever -- we have four TVs we use regularly, three are VIZIOs, and we've never had a problem. Fast and free Amazon Prime shipping were icing on the cake -- for painless Internet ordering, a great price, and two-day delivery, there was no way I was going to waste my time and burn $4 gas to make the big box store circuit.

Reviews.Title: Watch for reviews of 19" model here
Reviews.Author: Dale_in_OC
Reviews.Content: Amazon users should be aware that sometimes - as is the case here - reviews of different models are intermixed. The product listed is the 22" Vizio Model E221VA, while there are several reviews shown for the 19" Model E191VA. I know from personal experience, ratings and performance of products from the same manufacturer can vary widely across models. Caveat emptor.

Reviews.Title: All fine except the remote
Reviews.Author: JImbrie
Reviews.Content: Everything about it worked fine, easy to set up, high quality in both video and sound. It's a little smaller than I expected, but I got the smallest tv I could find, so I can't fault it on that.The only problem I've had is that it the remote will turn it on and work properly at first, but after 30 seconds or so, it'll just have no effect. So I'd have to hit the buttons on the tv itself, which is a slight inconvenience. I've checked the batteries and everything, it's all set up right. Maybe it's just my remote.Still a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Good Product for the price
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Barker "CB Naples"
Reviews.Content: The TV worked right out of the box.  Hooked up the Cable connection and got Cable TV.  Hooked the HDMI copnnection to my computer and had a second monitor.  Sound is fine for a 2nd TV.  Bought this one instead of Samsung because of many complaints about sound quality on comparible Samsung.  I am usually a Samsung fan, and this is my first Vizio.  I am happy with the price, quality, and performance.

Reviews.Title: Slam Dunk of a Deal
Reviews.Author: Brad from ATL
Reviews.Content: I purshased this Vizio E191VA TV yesterday and was able to set up the TV and install the base in about 10 minutes.  The audio is very good for a small TV.  The picture is also better than expected.  I was most impressed with the auto-scan feature that resulted in well over 100 channels with only the cable line plugged into the back.  For $148, this is one of the better deals that I have taken advantage of as a long-time Amazon shopper.  The individual that was unable to install the base should not have rated this TV so poorly.  The base slid on and locked with ease.  Buy this TV and you will be very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Not working out of the box...
Reviews.Author: E and M
Reviews.Content: Out of the box this product did not work with components, HDMI and AV, both of which were previously working on other TV's.  VIZIO asked that I pay for the item to be sent to their site and that it would take 14 to 24 business days for my repaired TV to be retuned to me.  I then called Amazon and they are sending out a new TV and have emailed a prepaid label to send the non-working TV back to them.  5 STARS for Amazon!**second TV worked perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Perfect fit for my kitchen
Reviews.Author: Juli_whitescarver
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv after purchasing another "cheap" brand tv.  I normally go with Vizio for my brand of choice, but thought at 19 in size range it wouldn't matter that much.  Boy was i wrong.  This vizio looks and sounds great straight from the box.  In every aspect this beats the "cheap" brand hands down.  Picture quality, audio quality, channel change responsiveness, general software exp, etc.  This is the perfect fit for my kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Very good value!
Reviews.Author: unter der laterne
Reviews.Content: This TV is for my kitchen since I spend a lot of time cooking and baking.The size is just perfect. So far I am very pleased with all the functions. The Picture Quality is excellent! The sound could be better but it is not bad by all means. I would not even hesitate to purchase this TV again! Thank you Amazon.com for making it so affordable!

Reviews.Title: Vizio E191VA 19 Inch 60HZ LED LCD Class Edge Lit Razor HDTV
Reviews.Author: Sandra S. Mull "ssm"
Reviews.Content: For the price of the TV and for how we use it, I believe it is a good value.  We have the TV attached to the wall in our office,where it is often playing while we are viewing the computer screen.  If something catches our attention we will turn around to watch it.  I can see it easily from my desk, which is on the other side of a fairly long room. In addition we often have it on while we are working in the kitchen and that means that often we are just listening to the TV. We can turn it so it is partially visible and are looking for a way to lengthen the arm on the wall mount so it is totally visible through the doorway. It has been downrated for poor audio, but because we are not using it for movies or serious watching, the audio is fine for us. I could easily recommend the TV for a purchaser who plans to use it in a way that is similar to what I have described above. We haven't had it long enough to know if it will work be pleased with the TV over the long term.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Glenn
Reviews.Content: It's a good tv if you need a smaller 2nd tv for your bedroom, like I did. Because it's only 60Hz, the HD shows via my Apple TV or Blu-ray player isn't fantastic. It just looks normal.  Great sound. Remote is easy to use.  Very light TV. I mounted it to a shelf with a mount that I bought here on Amazon for under $10!  This tv served its purpose for me.  Seller was helpful too.  He answered my questions about the TV being re-furbished!

Reviews.Title: A great buy
Reviews.Author: scentsible26
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived very quickly and I am quite pleased with it.  It was easy to set up and the picture is great.  I put it in the kitchen and the size doesn't take up too much counter space.  The price was right as well.

Reviews.Title: Really good for the price.
Reviews.Author: campbell1186
Reviews.Content: I just needed a small, cheap TV to get me through football season, and this has been perfect. It has good sound and display, and a nice clean look to it (you hardly notice it at all on my bookshelf).Definitely would suggest this.

Reviews.Title: Great little tv
Reviews.Author: Blake Hulbert
Reviews.Content: The tv has great picture, great sound, and I was very impressed that it was light, it was very easy to setup to an antenna, been using it for a day now and couldn't be happier with it.Thank you Vizio for making a quality tv.

Reviews.Title: A great buy
Reviews.Author: M. Heeke
Reviews.Content: This TV was purchased as a third television set in our home to be used in a bedroom. It met our expectations beautifully. Not large enough for the primary set in the home, but perfect for the bedroom where we placed it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: C. Hanburger
Reviews.Content: TV was just as promised.  Very slim design, great picture, easy set up.  Have this TV in the garage so awkward lighting at times, but the TV is great.  Picture is very clear.  Have an OTA antenna and am able to pick up about 2 dozen stations.  Would recommend this TV for certain.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Inglenook
Reviews.Content: The 20 year-old TV in the kitchen bit the dust. I replaced it with the 19" Vizio. Takes up less room than the old TV and provides more screen. Picture exceeded my expectations. Set up was a breeze. Great for those situations where a small footprint is a key criteria.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: tractor22
Reviews.Content: like the tv, good picture, wish i bought bigger. but it works in the garage. easy install.  have 48 inch vizo love that tv

Reviews.Title: Beware of false claims of new product!!
Reviews.Author: Zan Meera
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for my parents' 60 th anniversary for their kitchen as they have a large Vizio in their den and trust the product.  Was told and paid for a new TV.  Thought it odd it arrived packed only in peanuts no box, but it worked well after set up and thereafter until it quit working a week ago, less than 90 days after purchase.I contacted Vizio and I must say they were very professional and helpful.  Giving them the serial number of my TV allowed them to trace the product's life story.  Turns out it was sold at Walmart originally and then returned and then turned around and sold to Amazon's One Stop Shop who attempted to pass it off to me as new.  It is broken, no warranty, and I feel that I am not going to trust Amazon for purchase of electronics in future.  I hope to be made whole, but if anyone else has an issue with an electronic from Amazon failing shortly after purchase, suspect it was used but sold as new.  This is deceitful.  Do your diligence and talk to the electronics manufacturer directly to see what the sotry is on your product.  Shame on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: cute little TV, great for the kitchen
Reviews.Author: A.H.
Reviews.Content: Exactly as described, this little TV works perfectly for the kitchen.It has good volume, as nice clarity.We bought it with an articulating arm, so we can swing it any which way and angle it as we needI wish the cords would be white, bc now it totally shows up against the white walls, that looks weird and I have yet to find a nice cord hiding gadget.For the price, this TV is great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a 22" for the bedroom, etc., it'll be hard to find a better quality TV at such a good price.  For a 22" TV, the Vizio E221VA is great for the price.  I got it for $149, and it includes 1080p and is a LED LCD.  The picture quality is great, and having the speakers on the front allows the sound to be more than adequate.  There's an HDMI port on the back to allow for the best picture quality.  It's extremely lightweight, and the base is very sturdy.  It only has a 60Hz refresh rate (which means fast action sports may appear a little blurred), but for the size of the TV, that's one thing I was willing to overlook.  All the Vizios we've purchased have been great, and this one's on par with the rest.  I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Matthew Beilharz
Reviews.Content: I purchased this television for my kitchen, and it is mounted on a swing-arm.  The picture and sound are great, and the unit itself is very light, and was easy to mount.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: AF
Reviews.Content: Speakers are better than I thought they would be. You can connect your computer to it and use it as a monitor. It's a good TV/Monitor.

Reviews.Title: Problems With 1080p
Reviews.Author: Jason Madruga
Reviews.Content: The TV/monitor was a good buy at $120 on eBay.It has a built in digital TV tuner capable of capturing digital and analog TV signals, both antenna and cable.The problems I experience when I have a laptop and desktop computer with HDMI.It doesn't seem to display 1080p properly.The image displayed has green dots throughout and to resolve this I have to lower the res to 720p.The TV displays 1080p TV signals properly and my XBOX. But for me, not my laptop or desktop. Only 720p.Also, the TV/monitor does not tilt or swivel like conventional CRT and LCD monitors.

Reviews.Title: Stay AWAY From Seller "XtraSaver"
Reviews.Author: SpaceNabbers "JRR"
Reviews.Content: I'd have given this zero stars if possible! I don't normally "rip" a seller, but I have had this only 7 months and it stopped working after 5+. I was busy enough to not have the chance to request a return and refund until now, but Seller "XtraSaver" refused, saying that the item is out of the warranty period. Really now?! Pretty crappy to not stand behind your product after such a short period of time! I used it only 5 or 6 times (I don't have TV / cable / satellite so only watch movies and then only rarely due to my work schedule) and they expected it to not work so had a short warranty period? How convenient for them. I will never buy anything from sketchy and rip-off artist XtraSaver again, and will certainly stay away from the Vizio brand, as well, if it had to be refurbished in the first place and still wasn't completely repaired. Be forewarned and stay far away from this Seller!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good picture, bad sound
Reviews.Author: Joanna Daneman
Reviews.Content: This hi def television has a great picture. I might be impressed because it's actually my only hi-def tv (the other two I own are the kind you can't even give away anymore.) But the picture is crystal clear and sharp. The colors don't seem terribly intense, but it's quite acceptable.The sound is not good. Very muffled and tinny. If you connect this to external speakers, you might be better off. We just wanted a small tv to move to any room without a television (kitchen, sewing room, workout space) and with the  [Mohu Leaf Paper-Thin Indoor HDTV Antenna - Made in USA, I picked up quite a few broadcast stations I didn't know existed. Good enough.I was planning to hook this up to a portable DVD player, but the sound is so unsatisfactory, I'd have to add speakers. Which makes it not so great for the workout DVD application. If you find this on sale (which we did) it's a decent small tv but it's not perfect.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound control
Reviews.Author: John Y. Reddy Sr.
Reviews.Content: Everything about this tv is fine except the sound will on its on decrease or increase causing you to readjust it on a continual basis. This becomes a real pain!!!!

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E191VA
Reviews.Author: Cigarjohn47
Reviews.Content: I like the picture quality. Though the audio is real bad in my kitchen. It sounds like it's coming from a tunnel. Real brassy sounding. Though it did allow me to hook-up a pair of small computer speakers which enhanced the sound tremendously.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Ragena Moore
Reviews.Content: We have a large Vizio and the picture quality is awesome, so I have been searching for a small Vizio to mount on the wall in my kitchen. When I found this 19 inch, I ordered it right away, as the price was great. I have not been disappointed. The color and picture quality are great. I would recommend this TV to anyone looking for a small tv.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT set for the $$$
Reviews.Author: D. Ruiz "Dman"
Reviews.Content: Could not be happier. Picture is bright, crisp and vivid. Extremely light and thin. Looks very nice in our Kitchen.I own another Visio and am very happy with the quality of their products. I would HIGHLY recommend this set if you are looking at getting one.

Reviews.Title: Great looking TV with EXCELLENT SOUND if you don't hook it up to the wrong cable box!
Reviews.Author: S. Hampton "S. Hampton"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace an old one in my kitchen.  When I first hooked it up, the sound was terrible with an annoying humming in the background.  I thought, "oh my God, the bad sound reviews were right!"  But then I remembered that the old TV was analogue and the cable box was not for the newer HD TV sets, which this one is.  So, I took the cable box over to Time Warner for an exchange (no cost) and when I hooked up the TV to the new box, voila, GREAT SOUND.  So, I think some of the complaints regarding sound might have to do with this factor.The TV is very sleek looking, takes up little space and the picture is also very good.  I can't find anything wrong with this TV.  I LOVE it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Amazing.
Reviews.Author: A*
Reviews.Content: I was not expecting much from this TV. I wanted it for use in the kitchen and wasn't too concerned with a great picture. But once I turned it on I was all sorts of amazed. It has a really good picture, saying that is an understatement. It has an excellent picture. For the size of the screen everything looks extremely detailed and sharp. I was so happy with it that I hooked up my Roku to it! I don't have any issues with sound as some others have stated. When my husband didn't tell me that this TV was crap I knew it was a keeper.

Reviews.Title: A good value
Reviews.Author: Erin, New York City "Erin, New York City"
Reviews.Content: It took long enough to get this Vizio. Amazon Prime did not work its magic with 2-day delivery: took almost a month. But I am happy with the Vizio and am having none of the problems that some reviewers mention here. Sound is impressive, picture is great: I'm getting HD just with a cable connection, no HDMI. A fine tv for the price. Good for a kitchen tv, or spare bedroom. I hear that Sony makes Vizio. Another plus.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: great tv perfect size for camping and for a childs bed room. very thin tv too so fits in small places

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: D. Miller
Reviews.Content: The tv is the perfect fit for my kitchen counter.  It just fits under the cabinets.  The picturre is great and the sound is quite good considering the small size of the speakers.  Of course the bass is reenforced bouncing off the counter top, so it is very dependent on location.

Reviews.Title: One of the best
Reviews.Author: Uncle Marv
Reviews.Content: It is well worth the money.  It is perfect for watching while running on my treadmill.  The size is good.too.

Reviews.Title: vizio E191VA 19 inch 60HZ LED LCD
Reviews.Author: Janis Vigoda
Reviews.Content: I like everything about this tv.  It was easy to set up, the picture and sound are good.  I would highly recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Sheldon Malone
Reviews.Content: The size and quality is superb. I got it for my 78 year old mother and she loves it. The size is perfect for her room and the quality is great for her sight and her hearing.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Great Price
Reviews.Author: Krista
Reviews.Content: Ordered as gifts for kids' rooms. They love them. Easy to set up, great picture. Would recommend to anyone looking for smaller tv for bedrooms.

Reviews.Title: 22 inch vizio
Reviews.Author: patricia p rainville
Reviews.Content: it was a replacement for a television exactly like it....that had lasted about 4 yrs.....that part wasn't impressive, but, for the price, it is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Gotta love Vizio
Reviews.Author: Judy Haggadone
Reviews.Content: This is the third (3) Vizio I have bought. Even though it is still Brand New in box ready for our camper this summer....!  The reason I chose this tv is because of the Superior Quality we have gotten from our other two (2) Vizio's for the last six (6) years....!  "just saying"  ,; - )

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: APS
Reviews.Content: Previously I had purchased 3 other small TV's for use in my kitchen. These were other brands. The sound on all three was horrible. These TV's had a tin can sound. I had to return each one of these. Shame on those manufacturers for making such poor products.  The Vizio's sound is terrific and so it the picture. I also like how thin this TV is and it sits flat on the counter rather than having a pedistool base. Just love this TV!

Reviews.Title: Well exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: Chuck V.
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of the reviews on Amazon’s website, especially the negative ones (which tend to give me an idea of possible problem areas with any product).  Then I decided to purchase the TV to put in a corner of the bedroom, choosing the 22” set for an investment of around $150.  After all, for that much money, how bad could the TV be?  My impression is really positive.  Setup was simple, the picture quality with HD input has been very good, and sound (though obviously not as good as what you’d find on a large TV) was also quite good.  I would not hesitate to recommend it.  In this case, most of the negative reviews were just plain wrong.

Reviews.Title: User Manual Problem
Reviews.Author: Gerald  W. Richards
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item on Nov 30, 2012 and did not set it up until Dec 25th.  I used the Qucik Start Guide and the Tv worked fine.  I went to the Vizio web site for the on-line User Manual.  After some confusion, I discovered that the on-line User Manual did not match my set.  Apparently, Vizio removed a couple of features and made some other changes; therefore, the on-line User Manual is out of date for my set.  I contacted Vizio and was told that the new on-line User Manual is not ready yet.  They hope to have the new User Manual available sometime soon.  Doesn't seem like good service.

Reviews.Title: New TV
Reviews.Author: Pam H "Pam H"
Reviews.Content: I love having a TV I can actually see in a room with sunlight all around.  No problems getting it set up, although I haven't quite mastered the ATT U'verse set up for the TV and a separate TV dvr.  User error.  Our main TV is also a Vizio and it is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: beth
Reviews.Content: Very nice tv for money, forget fighting black friday crowd. Better to pay a couple of dollars more and be comfortable at home.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV for the Kitchen
Reviews.Author: David C. Arnold "master D"
Reviews.Content: Excellent unit for the price.  Off air tuner is very good, pulling in far more channels with much less signal drop than the Magnovox VCR/DVD recorder with HD Tuner I previously used to tune off-air channels to feed old TV set this one replaced..

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Leer
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace an old tube tv.....nice picture and sound.Would highly recommend if you are looking for a small tv.

Reviews.Title: okay for cost
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: The cost was a little high but i needed it quickly so prime it is. So far it works just fine for the application of a CCTV replacement monitor.

Reviews.Title: Visio Rules
Reviews.Author: T. Bauer
Reviews.Content: This is the second Vizio I own. This set is in the kitchen and looks & sounds so great that I ordered a hi-def box from my cable supplier so that we can enjoy everything Vizio provides.

Reviews.Title: good cheap tv/monitor
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: only problem that I have is sometimes when using it as a monitor with an hdmi to displayport cable it shows a blue screen with the floating text "NO SIGNAL" and I have to pull out the hdmi cable from the back and push it back in hard! but its only once in a while, not very often. the sound is good for a small tv and the picture quality is excellent for the price!

Reviews.Title: Vizio 19" LED/LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Thia
Reviews.Content: Having previously purchased a 32" VIZIO LCD tv for another room, when I was ready to buy a small tv for my kitchen, I  chose VIZIO brand, once again. Delivery was timely. Set up was very simple. Quality is excellent. It's perfect for  my kitchen counter from a space standpoint and with its very sharp and clear picture, I can see and hear it clearly from anywhere in my kitchen, eating area and into the living room.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Rusian B. Bailey
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for our kitchen.  It is attractive and has a good picture.  I would highly recommend this TV.  Good price also.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good: BUT...No tech support.
Reviews.Author: THE ULTIMATE PIZZA MANUAL Fan
Reviews.Content: NO AUDIO ON ARRIVAL (through the L/R audio inputs). AND NO PHONE TECH SUPPORT to speak of. Person who answered the phone (Manuel) at VIZIO says, "There is no way to connect an audio input to this TV" and refuses to put a person who knows what he or she is talking about on the phone -- or knows what ~I~ am talking about. TV is going back in the box.UPDATE: Turns out that the audio input doesn't work without plugging in the video input, which I hadn't connected yet. Too bad the VIZIO "rep" didn't know this and tell me.Picture quality: Pretty good, almost as good as the hi-def, HDMI picture.

Reviews.Title: Missing part
Reviews.Author: carl hollaway
Reviews.Content: It came with the remote missing and there was some sort of glue or tape adhesive stuck to the screen

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: All was good service shipping and the tv works well for my kids for the price. Clear. No crack. Works well. Kids are happy happy with the product. Screen is a little small but that's all you can do for a kids room to keep them from saying in too much.

Reviews.Title: OK for 4 months
Reviews.Author: Roland01
Reviews.Content: I was completely satisfied until one morning it would not turn on.  I tried every trick in the book with no success.  However, the supplier did refund my purchase price but I am out the shipping. If it kept running it would be a good TV.

Reviews.Title: Great little television
Reviews.Author: A.B.
Reviews.Content: I just got this today and set it up and it works great. I really was not expecting a lot out of a small television, but I have been pleasantly surprised.My only beef is that the seller called me and asked me to remove my neutral review that the unit did not arrive when Amazon estimated it would. I may be a stickler, but Amazon has been so great to me over the years that if it tells me to expect my package by a certain date, I know it will be to me by that date.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E191VA 19 inch LCD TV
Reviews.Author: R. Zenorini
Reviews.Content: This is the second one I have purchased in 18 months.  Sound and picture quality are excellent for a small TV.  I use this TV for receiving free HD channels over the air with a roof top antenna. There are about 50 channels available in the NYC metro area.Improvements made:A. On my first one the vertical viewing angle was extremely limited.  The screen would darken if you viewed it from slightly above or slightly below direct on as would happen if one stands up or sits down.  The current model is much improved.B. On the remote there is now a short cut for changing channels, a big improvement over scrolling up and down or direct entry of channel numbers.Negatives:A big reversal is the elimination of the next listed program on a channel's schedule. Previously, the "info" button on the remote would show you what is currently being shown along with a short description of the program plus the same information for the next scheduled program.  The TV I just purchased just gives you the current program but no description.  There is no information concerning the next scheduled program.  This is a big deficiency as it makes it impossible to know what is coming up next and prevents planning you evening.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO TV/MONITOR
Reviews.Author: Lyndon V. Saylor "618-1"
Reviews.Content: VIZIO IS THE REASON I PURCHASED THIS ITEM. THE SELLER SAID IT WAS LIKE NEW ONLY TAKEN OUT OF BOX TO SEE IF ALL PARTS WERE THERE. THAT DISCRIPTION IS NOT ACCURATE BECAUSE THE TV HAS DUST ON A LEDGE OF THE SCREEN, THE REMOTE HAD THE BATTIERS INSTALLED, THE INPUT, EXIT AND BACK BUTTONS ARE WORN FROM USE. NOT A TRUST WORTHY SELLER IN MY OPINION. IT WAS PACKED VERY WELL AND I RECIEVED IT IN A TIMLY MANNER.

Reviews.Title: good bargain, but no manual
Reviews.Author: cheryl conlee
Reviews.Content: The TV was a good deal pricewise, but it was difficult to set up without the manual. Vizio wants you to go online to download the manual and I tried, but could not find the manual for my model number. I was able to figure out set up by hit or miss. Was frustrating.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Warren K Lilly
Reviews.Content: For what you pay, its a great TV.  Picture is pretty decent and VESA mounting is availble.  There could be a few more inputs but other than that its a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Love it! Nice low profile for kitchen and office TV
Reviews.Author: L. A. "L. A."
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these, one for the kitchen and one for my home office. They have a nice low profile for fitting into a small space under the kitchen cabinets and on my desk under a bookshelf. I have probably had them both for over a year and both are working great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a small room
Reviews.Author: Aaron Coudeyras
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the quality of the picture and features for the price.  I have since upgraded to a 32" TV though because even for a small room this TV was hard to see details from 5-6 feet away.  My eyesight is like 20/80 though, so take that for what it's worth.  Good little TV.

Reviews.Title: Beware of Power On Issues after Warranty Expires
Reviews.Author: C. Stroope
Reviews.Content: Bought this 19" Vizio TV from Amazon in Dec 2012. Worked fine until this month when I was unable to turn the TV on. Power light came on, but no Vizio logo. Googled the problem and found it is inherent in Vizio TVs of all sizes. My workaround (for now) is to unplug it and hold down the power button on the TV for 30 seconds, plug it back and and hope it comes on. Not sure how long that will continue to work. Good thing is that I didn't pay that much for this 19" kitchen TV, which replaced a 20-yr old Sanyo that was (and still is) working just fine...just taking up a lot of real estate on the counter. I won't be buying a Vizio TV of any size in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Sylvia B.
Reviews.Content: Wonderful picture, very happy with it.  Highly recommended.  This is our first Vizio, so would not hesitate to purchase this make again.

Reviews.Title: Great quality!
Reviews.Author: Raul Vazquez
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mom because her old tv finally broke and I wanted her to have something new. She had a 19" old square tv up on the wall that was held up by a shelf in the top corner of her room so I bought this 19" thinking it would take up the same amount of space but boy was I wrong lol this was way to small! I ended up giving it to my Grandma as a gift but the TV itself is of great quality! The resolution is so smooth and it just looks amazing!

Reviews.Title: Steal, to say the least
Reviews.Author: Jacob
Reviews.Content: For the price, this HDTV is absolutely amazing. The crystal clarity is perfect. The look gives a sleek and modern feel that without a doubt upgraded my living room.No complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: the the product is a bang for the bucks..
Reviews.Author: ericatonediaz
Reviews.Content: I chose this product becuse it was the type of product i needed for a gift for my son who likes to play his gaming devices. The HD quality is outsanding.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 19"
Reviews.Author: reknirb "bj84711"
Reviews.Content: Ordered this unit to fit in a limited space.  TV picture is great, and sound very goodfor this size unit.  Has typical Vizio remote, however, and they are sometimesfrustrating to use....channel numbers are very close together, and you must enterthem slowly, or multiple numbers come up on the screen.  I have a total of fiveVizios, and plan on two more in the near future.  Excellent sets for the money!

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: Sue H.
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect set for our guest room. Very compact in size and a clear crisp picture. Sound quality is just OK, but a great compact set for a place where you want occasional use.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Terrific Picture and Sound, Love It!
Reviews.Author: Alexandra
Reviews.Content: Love this TV, it is my 3rd Vizio. I have it next to my computer and it keeps me company while I work. The sound is great and the picture has bright, vibrant colors. I couldn't be happier. I bought my first Vizio about 5 years ago, and I'm sold on them. For the price, I don't think you can own a better TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Madeleine Jarvis
Reviews.Content: I've had the TV almost a year and love it. It's small but it's big enough for my needs. And it sure has helped lower my electric bill. Before I had a 27-inch tube TV.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs.
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I just wanted a HDTV after years of having a cheap standard definition television; but I didn't want to spend more 200 bucks. The price was good, and I'm happy with the result, it looks great and fits perfectly in my room, not too big, not too small.

Reviews.Title: Good TV!
Reviews.Author: Kaushik Saha
Reviews.Content: Yes this TV is 720p. But you hardly notice it at this small form factor, The TV works great as a second monitor to my laptop. Have been using this for over a year with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Got this tv for my mom
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: I got this for my mom for a christmas gift and they put the tv in her kitchen. great picture great sound, this tv gets more usage than her 50 inch downstairs.

Reviews.Title: Terrific TV
Reviews.Author: Greta Macias
Reviews.Content: After checking all of the reviews of small TVs. I picked this one. What a winner! The reception is great, the picture very sharp, the sound very good. It is light enough that I can push it against the wall on my kitchen counter, out of the way, but pull it back so I can watch it as I wish. It is as bright and clear as our large, more expensive other TVs in the house but so much more versatile.

Reviews.Title: This is a nice tv.
Reviews.Author: J.J.
Reviews.Content: Since I am not an expert on television quality all I can say is that I wanted a small tv for my daughters room, saw this one which had decent reviews and went with it. It works great.

Reviews.Title: 19" Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: Gene
Reviews.Content: The product was delivered much sooner than I anticipated.  The price was right in comparison to retail stores.  Two complaints:  the product is made in China and the product did not come with an instruction booklet.  My cable company was no help, so I had to call the home office of Vizio to get help in setting up the TV.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: vryhappy
Reviews.Content: Cousin has it in his truck and was glad to see it coming his way. He is able to hook his VCR up and watch movies.

Reviews.Title: great little TV
Reviews.Author: John S. Ebner "Enforcer Dog"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for the kitchen and it's great, the sound is good sitting on the counter especially with the front firing speaker. I would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: GAC
Reviews.Author: Grant Cooper
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV for our kitchen. It fits just fine under our kitchen cabinets with it mounted on top of our DISH DVR. With standard shipping it arrived within two days! Very easy, hassle free setup with HDMI cable. Beautiful picture! Great sound! We couldn't be more pleased with our new Vizio TV. It certainly earns 5 stars from us.

Reviews.Title: Great deal on a great TV!
Reviews.Author: Robert dillon
Reviews.Content: The TV exceeds the performace that was advertised so I'm very happy (was supposed to be 720P but is actually 1080P).

Reviews.Title: The Best
Reviews.Author: Joanne Alexander
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv hoping that I had found a good deal...and that indeed was true. It shipped fast,came intact and the tv worked fine!

Reviews.Title: Buy It If You Can Still Find One
Reviews.Author: Dminiguy37
Reviews.Content: I looked especially and found this at Amazon.  It's a previous years model that I like better than the new replacement.  This one has a better and more substantial base than the replacement and has the speaker across the front for better sound.  I can't see any differences in the actual picture.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Holly Smith
Reviews.Content: This 19" Vizio is just the right size for my kitchen.  I also am very pleased with the sound quality of this TV.  This was a great purchase for the price.

Reviews.Title: "Top of the World folks"
Reviews.Author: gejome "quality music lover"
Reviews.Content: Of  the several different 19" TV,s I researched, Vizio comes out top of the heap. Excellent picture resolution, great sound with plenty of volume. Several different 19" color TV manufacturers all a lesser cost, but none are a match for VIZIO when it comes to end users satisfaction. When in the future I may need a larger screen TV for other locations, I won't hesitate to buy a VIZIO. Spend a few extra bucks for the make and you will never regret it !

Reviews.Title: Excellent small TV
Reviews.Author: Su Su
Reviews.Content: I am using this for a security monitor. It has a great picture and I like the flush design. Doesn't have a formal stand so it doesn't look like a TV. Delivery by vendor was as promised. The item arrived safely.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E191VA Low Sound Quality
Reviews.Author: Jerry C. Shaw "psjerry"
Reviews.Content: Love the size for our kitchen. Sound level is terrible. Great picture quality and price. But its hard to hear it sometimes. Otherwise 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Shawn Line
Reviews.Content: Nice monitor, I use this in my camper and when not using in my camper I use on my personal computer!!!

Reviews.Title: Good, solid tv
Reviews.Author: Ronald Donatelli
Reviews.Content: It is what it advertises to be. Nice picture(clear and sharp), adequate sound, and easily tuneable(?) The only problem is the remote control. It is awkward to use and hard to change channels easily!

Reviews.Title: vary good
Reviews.Author: Patrick Malone
Reviews.Content: Really good TV just what  I need for next to my desk. I recommend it if you need a small TV for your office

Reviews.Title: My table-top presentations look great
Reviews.Author: Gary "Music Man"
Reviews.Content: The structural design is matched by the clear, quality of it's screen images. The HDMI-in is useful and this little TV looks great on a table top. The stand holds it upright at a good angle. High quality at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: SCarol Br
Reviews.Content: I've only had this for about a week, but so far I feel like I've got a good little TV. The picture seems quite good to me ( I just have an external antenna, no cable) and it has no sound problems. In fact I only have the volume up about a third of the way. So far, I'm really glad I bought this TV. From the reviews that I read for other brands it was starting to seem really hard to get a good 19" TV but I think I have found one.

Reviews.Title: Mom loves it!
Reviews.Author: June "June"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 83 year old mother for her birthday.  She got it set up and loves it.  Great picture.  We have had other Visio tv's and all have made us happy.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: my mom loved it we have it in our kitchen and there is no such thing as sound problems it sounds perfect!! i dont know why people say this tv has sound issues. THAT IS NOT TRUE. THE SOUND IS PERFECT.

Reviews.Title: Very cute
Reviews.Author: Hadiza Oshozekhai
Reviews.Content: Very sharp and clear. Fit nicely in my kitchen, I use this Tv for watch cooking shows and recipes while cooking

Reviews.Title: Nice picture, good price, tinny sound
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I wanted a compact TV for the kitchen and this one has a good price, a thin profile and it has a nice picture. However the  sound is somewhat lacking.  Tiny speakers project towards the rear, but after a week or two you get used to it.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: apeavy
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my mom for Christmas to use in kitchen, also purchased mount and it worked great.  Couldn't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: vizio 19" works good
Reviews.Author: Art
Reviews.Content: I like the Vizio 19" it works good. It was a good price and comes in good. I use it in my garage.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 19" tv
Reviews.Author: Donald J Darce
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for about a month and so far it exceeds my expectations.  I don't have cable and the picture quality using an antenna is awesome.  The sound is very dynamic for such a small tv.  Set up was a breeze and took only a few minutes.  This tv is used in the kitchen and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: doris treece
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture ! Happy with the price. This was for my guest room but would be great in any small room.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!!
Reviews.Author: lop
Reviews.Content: I love this TV and I like it beacuse small and it fits in my room and it's great tv

Reviews.Title: Great small tv for the money!
Reviews.Author: DLC
Reviews.Content: Bought this for kitchen use.  Great plug and play tv.  The only thing that needed fine tuning was the sound...kinda tinny.

Reviews.Title: Kitchen TV with style and function
Reviews.Author: Fred the Blacksmith
Reviews.Content: This 19" is the perfect partner with my Fios service. No more running back and forth to the living room as we cook or enjoy breakfast. With its thin compact design, it fits right in to give us "media with meals!"

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Mims
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV for my kitchen.  It fits perfectly under the cabinet.  This TV has an awesome picture!  We have a big screen Sony Bravia so we are used to watching an excellent picture.  We are very happy with this Vizio TV and would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Gary Basor
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife in the kitchen. Perfect size. What a surprise. It has one of the best pictures for it's size I have seen. We are on Satalite and the set up was flawless. It searched the signal and set itself up. A real no brainer.I plan on purchasing another one for the guest bedroom.

Reviews.Title: bad sound good picture
Reviews.Author: Patricia E Carter
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a small office... turned out to be too small and will move to bedroom.The sound is canned... could use better speakers

Reviews.Title: great little tv
Reviews.Author: jackson
Reviews.Content: beautiful picture and is very user friendly. i would highly recommend this TV to  someone looking for a  kitchen TV or for a camper where  area is small.

Reviews.Title: Good picture and sound quality
Reviews.Author: Aurora
Reviews.Content: Greatest concern was (1) Quality of picture when viewed from an angle, and (2) Quality of sound. Both are very good, particularly the sound which comes from the speakers being at the front bottom instead of the real bottom or the back of the unit. Either of the latter two causes sound to bounce off whatever the unit may be sitting upon. Front speakers give very good sound quality, with no adjustments needed.

Reviews.Title: Nice and bright
Reviews.Author: Modayvia "Mo'Dayvia La'Beija"
Reviews.Content: I like this television, it's light in weight and big on sound. The colors pops out at you. The UBS port and HDMI port are great. I don't like the fact that you have to share the composite and component port as one. Most television has separate ports for each. It would of been nice if it had two HDMI port instead of one. For the most part the television is a powerful on and greatly design. It's my first Vizio product and it will not be my last. Great job Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: Terrence Nixa
Reviews.Content: Using this TV with antenna to watch network HD stations and it works fine. The remote is kind of touchy and you have to point it right at the TV but other than that I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money-
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Lynn Taylor
Reviews.Content: This T.V. has  a beautiful picture, and its fantastic and easy directions for set-up. I actually love this T.V.,but found it to be too small for my needs.Since the time is up for returns,-I bought another T.V.(22in.) and plan on selling this one. I wish I had room for both,because I like it so much.I just hope the other T.V. has the picture quality that the 19in. has.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for the price!
Reviews.Author: B. Shields "ShieldsBJS"
Reviews.Content: This TV was for the kitchen area so I wanted something with a small foot print.  The base of this TV is almost non-existent in that the TV sits flat on the surface.  Most bases add at least 2" to the height but not this one.  Setup was super easy.  Can't complain at all about the sound which I saw in some other reviews.  I have a ROKU attached and that as well, was an easy setup with this TV.  It's only been a few weeks, but I haven't had any problems.  Would consider purchasing a larger size version of this TV based on this experience.

Reviews.Title: Perfect balance of price/quality
Reviews.Author: Tony Jones "mrkitchn"
Reviews.Content: For this size TV I could not believe what was available. I just wanted a decent picture and sound, and a name I had at least heard of, for the breakfast room. This unit has great big sound and a picture every bit as good as the samsungs etc that I like except they cost another $100. Highly recommend this unit. We were also needing as short a unit as possible and this one has an integrated stand which saves about an inch in height.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for the Kitcken
Reviews.Author: Ted K "duraflex"
Reviews.Content: The VIZIO E191VA is a great little TV for the Kitchen or a kid's bedroom.  The actual image size (top to bottom) is just slightly bigger than a conventional 13 inch tube TV but the footprint is a lot smaller.  The VIZIO is very compact and lightweight.  The speakers are in the front and the screen angles up slightly.  The remote is simple and intuitive.  The screen has a nice flat finish which eliminates glare and room reflections.Here's the tricky part - it requires a lot of tweaking to get a perfect picture and sound but once you spend the time, you're set.  There are lots of adjustments you can make which is a very good thing for techies like me.  I bought a refurbished unit for $110 and am well-satisfied, so far.  My concern is that Vizio does not have a good track record for reliability being on a par with Coby so who knows how long it will last.  After 3 days, it looks and sounds great.  I'm running the BASS setting at full - otherwise the audio is very thin.The TV also has a PC input, USB connection and analog audio out.The major manufacturers have chosen NOT to build smaller sets so if that's what you need and want, you're forced to look to second-tier makers for a small TV.  In fact, Vizio no longer has any 19 inch sets on their website so I assume this model has been discontinued.  Buy one while you still can.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: jsmitch
Reviews.Content: Sharp picture, great audio.  Looked at dozens of possible replacements for 13" TV in bedroom -- this one stood out big time.  Super easy out of box experience.

Reviews.Title: great little tv
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my bedroom, very happy with it. The sound is also great, I didn't need speakers or Soundbar like I purchased for my larger TV in my living room.

Reviews.Title: Ok for a Vizio
Reviews.Author: Juan C. Diaz
Reviews.Content: The first one I received had a line going down the right side of the screen, I had to get it replaced, It's a nice TV, I LOVE VIZIO, I just wish it also came with an S video hook up. I had to do alot of rewiring so I can use it with my Karaoke player. I had to buy an extra 25' of AV component cable to hook it up where I wanted it. But I definetly recommend this Vizio  They make GREAT TVs.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E191VA"  19" TV
Reviews.Author: Bonnie L Eaton
Reviews.Content: This Vizio is my second one; the first being 37" foir my family room. I'm very satisfied with the quality of the product.  I really wanted a 16" Vizio for my kitchen counter, but were always out of stock or not be made.  The 19" TV fits very nicely on the counter and it really doesn't take up much more room.  The TV was delivered in a timely fashion as scheduled.  I do plan on getting a 32" Vizio for my bedroom in a few months.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice - Except for One Thing
Reviews.Author: K. Brooks
Reviews.Content: This is my first VIZIO TV.  I chose it for a small room primarily because of the reputation of VIZIO and the built-in SRS sound bar.  The picture is excellent, the set-up was very easy and straight forward, and the sound is good.  The one thing I find rather annoying is that it takes about 15 seconds for the picture and sound to come on after I turn it on.  At first, I thought I had done something wrong when I set it up using the HDMI cable.  After looking through the entire manual and not finding any reference to this problem I sent an e-mail to VIZIO asking if there was a setting I could change to fix it.  Their reply was "That is a normal function on the VIZIO TV. We show our logo first and then we have the TV load up."Although this is not a serious problem I find it rather annoying.  When I purchase the big TV for my family room it will not be a VIZIO.

Reviews.Title: sound quality is poor
Reviews.Author: bill cooley
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv looking for a replacement for the Sharp tv I had in the kitchen. I had read the comments about the sound quality and said it cant be that bad. Its bad. I would not buy this tv again and I hope the seller will take it back or at least exchange it for another tv. Extremely poor sound quality. Picture is fine just poor sound.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Hazel Reed
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv for my in laws for Christmas to sit in their kitchen. they love it.  It is the perfect size.

Reviews.Title: NOT BAD AT ALL
Reviews.Author: Matthew Villanueva "Avid shopper"
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice small TV. Has a thin design and easy to hook up and program. BUT the casing does not lite up like they say..

Reviews.Title: VISIO E221VA 22-inch Razor HDTV
Reviews.Author: Vincent Boudreau
Reviews.Content: The VISIO  E221VA 22-inch Razor HDTV is perfect on my kitchen counter. The picture is crisp and the sound excellent. Great buy!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: Barry Spurlock
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to mount to an Octane elliptical (exercise equipment).  Performance is fantastic for this application.  Picture is wonderful, and for a 19 inch TV sound is fine.  Some folks have given lower rating for sound, but if you're buying a 19 inch, what do you expect?  The only negative applies to my application.  Some of the input locations on the back are in the middle, thus the mount for the elliptical covers them up.  If you're ok with coax input on an exercise machine - which I am - this is perfect.

Reviews.Title: poor audio
Reviews.Author: JoAnn McDonald
Reviews.Content: The audio was awful.  Voice sounded like it was coming out of a barrel, It was very annoying. I took the advice of another reviewer and bought a set of computer speakers and put them on either side of the TV - it worked.  I really did not want to go to the trouble of sending it back, but if i bought it at a local store, i would have returned it.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 22
Reviews.Author: Linda Wolff "Linda"
Reviews.Content: We have 2 of these TV's, both in our offices.  We have no complaints at all with these TV's.  I bought one for my husband for Christmas and loved the picture and the size so for my birthday he bought me one.  The size is nice for our home offices and when we have company they enjoy it too.

Reviews.Title: So excited for this kitchen tv...
Reviews.Author: will
Reviews.Content: So excited for this tv..looks soo fine and matches the big one...sound bar fixes any thought of hearing the tv...reading the actual book explaines so very much of all that this reciever can do...select scan mode and got 37 channels all HDTV/SOUND for free..a very simple antenna worked great in my area....After playing with the menu and remote there are so many adjustments that can be made...  Has every hookup known to man ...And fits under the cabinets just fine...overall read the book they did not make ten million of these tv's if they do not work...right ?...yes there are lemons...take a chance it's a great tv....I will hopefully follow up with an actual review as it arrives in just a few days...VIZIO E191VA 19-Inch 60Hz LED LCD Class Edge Lit Razor HDTV (Black)

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Math bird
Reviews.Content: Nice bright, clear picture. Good purchase for the price. Replaced another small TV over the cabinet and  I'm very glad I did.

Reviews.Title: Like New
Reviews.Author: george febo
Reviews.Content: needed a new TV for the kitchen, this one is amazing!!! Terrific picture, great viewing from different angles in the room, and an unbelievable value-- it may have been advertised as "refurbished" but when it arrived it was packaged like new, and I couldn't find a single blemish , scratch, or defect anywhere-- I highly recommend this seller

Reviews.Title: Its new but great
Reviews.Author: Is it So who knows "Opinion Oky"
Reviews.Content: The picture is as good as my Samsung and the sound is far better. I'm hard of hearing and my Samsung needs to be jacked to the top to hear it, this is loud enough at 1/2 volume. The sound is also clear. Ok its 2 months old so maybe in time something will happen, right now its a buy buy buy!

Reviews.Title: Great for the guest room!
Reviews.Author: novel26
Reviews.Content: This is a great set! I needed something with a very low profile to put on a chest of drawers in our guest room and it fit in nicely. The picture is wonderful.Great Purchase

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: M. Daliks
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for use in the kitchen. Perfect size, image, and sound. I did make menu color adjustments to correct for our signal and I have it connected to our HDTV cable box with obviously a vastly improved resolution over standard cable. I don't see how you can beat it at this price point. The usual perfect Amazon experience: price, availability, and shipping service.Couldn't be more satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Its okay for the price
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM PEREZ
Reviews.Content: Not a bad looking TV for the price. However, I wish I could have gotten a bigger one instead. At least a 24 inch would have done the job for the bedroom

Reviews.Title: cute little vizio
Reviews.Author: OMar
Reviews.Content: this little baby kept me company for a while its great and graphics are amazing. id tell any onee to buy why not

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Fischer "JFish"
Reviews.Content: TV arrived on time and as advertised. Very good picture and sound. I have mounted it in my travel trailer and so far no problems.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Martini
Reviews.Content: great little tv for the pricce.  more words required nothing else to say.  more words required nothing else to say

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Maximus
Reviews.Content: This TV is great i bought it to use as a computor monitor and so far its awesome. the picture is crisp and clear with no ghosting while reading as with many TVs that are used as monitors. the sound is also really good i chose them over the speakers i bought for the computer. overall the best 19 inch t you will find and one of the cheapest.

Reviews.Title: Awesome LCD!
Reviews.Author: Pjryb
Reviews.Content: Always liked Vizio TVs, Bought this one for my grandmother figure she have one for her bedroom whenever she wanted to watch TV.  Very good price for a good quality LCD, Would recommend to anyone who needs a second hand TV.

Reviews.Title: Very good sound!
Reviews.Author: Gary J. Landman
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is very good but clear front facing speakers have excellent sound quality. Best I've heard on a small flat screen. Most small flat screens have tiny tinny sounding speakers.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV for Motorhome
Reviews.Author: JK
Reviews.Content: Perfect size, great picture, very light weight---just what we wanted for a 2nd TV in the rear of the motorhome.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Lorri
Reviews.Content: Exactly what we needed for our kitchen.  We were able to get a 22" with room to spare under the cabinets.  The picture quality is very good.  Setting it up was a breeze!  Couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, ok sound.
Reviews.Author: W. W. "closet meglo-maniac"
Reviews.Content: This TV is a perfect replacement for the 13" tube tv in the kitchen.  I have a large Visio LCD tv in the living room that I am very happy with, so I expected the same for this one.  The small speakers sound like small speakers; a little tinny, then muddy if you try too get more low frequency sound from them.All things considered we are quite happy with this tv.

Reviews.Title: HDTV
Reviews.Author: A. Frost
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little tv for a kitchen or office space. The remote is a little clumsy, as the channels include antenna and cable, so there may be six of "channel 8", including the 8.1, 8.2, etc. This tv was great for the price, and serves its intended purpose.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E191VA
Reviews.Author: Granny "mur"
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly, priced right, well packed, works like a dream, great video and audio. Yes I would recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great value when I bought it, more expensive now
Reviews.Author: Sho
Reviews.Content: I wanted a medium size screen for TV and computer, perfect...great color rendering etc, Vizio is a very nice company, solid products at great prices!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture and Sound
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV with the intention of using it while travelling on business to play PS3 in rooms without a TV. It is light and highly portable. This TV has a sharp 1080p picture that accomplishes what I intended. The sound is also very good for the size of the speakers.

Reviews.Title: best purchase ever
Reviews.Author: bill fredericksdorf
Reviews.Content: the speakers on the tv suck weed but i bought a cheap pair of lansing speakers and now i am happy as a clam. i love this little tv. it is exactly what i wanted and i am not used to getting anything as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Great Views tv ..! I recommend it ..!
Reviews.Author: ana hernandez
Reviews.Content: First public apologies for rating the store as irresponsible by not handing the bag (the tv) time. But it was not the fault of the store was the fault of the courier company and parcels, it was only a misunderstanding. We are all human beings and we make mistakes.That said, the tv. spectacular, as I imagined and promoted as the store, really recommend it 100% and shop super responsible.!!

Reviews.Title: Nice compact little unit
Reviews.Author: Bruce A. Mallett
Reviews.Content: Perfect for a small space.  Picture quality is not as good as some of the large more expensive units but for the money it is a good value.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: tfw58/53
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from another seller but wanted to add review on Amazon. Excellent picture, sound and design. I would recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Clean look, great picture, sound OK
Reviews.Author: SLM "SLM"
Reviews.Content: Quality of picture and the look of the unit are excellent.  Sound was advertised as excellent...and while it might be better than other sets of this size it's still nothing to write home about.  I would for sure buy again and am very satisfied wtih it...just pointing out that the sound quality is a bit oversold.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for what I wanted
Reviews.Author: rocky46
Reviews.Content: Use this in my exercise room in front of my spinner. Great picture, good sound. Great little TV and it's HD. Works perfectly with my Sony BDP-S185 Blu-Ray Disc Player and takes up very little room.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Jordan Delaney
Reviews.Content: The Product came as described and I really like the Vizio. It comes with some great features - for example - it scans all of the channels available on the cable and it works sort of like a TV guide. I also like the fact that I can hookup the HDMI to my laptop and use it as a secondary and/or larger monitor screen.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the kitchen
Reviews.Author: Ken Bromberg
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter to use in her kitchen.  Very good picture and she's very happy with it.  Vizio's price and performance sealed the deal.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: bartbaby
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son and his wife to use in their bedroom.  They love it and it is just the right size.  Good quality.

Reviews.Title: 19 inch Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: Paul F. Dolby Jr. "Air Force Veteran"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item as a Christmas, last December. Very good quality, at a reasonable Price, for a Led-Lcd Razor HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Grainy picture
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Very bad picture when in cable mode, grainy and distorted. Looks good with DVD.Sound is OK. I'm very disappointed. Save up and buy a better one.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for bedroom
Reviews.Author: Frances E. Daniel
Reviews.Content: The picture is remarkably clear and the size is perfect for a bedroom. Sound is a bit tinny, but it's not bad. Called technical support when I didn't do something right and they were amazing! Good product backed by good service at  very fair Amazon price.

Reviews.Title: Super great
Reviews.Author: Courtney D "Luca74"
Reviews.Content: Super great little TV for our RV. We needed something small for our very small space with a good picture and fair price. This definitely fit the bill.

Reviews.Title: Great X-Mas Gift!
Reviews.Author: " BARGAIN HUNTER "
Reviews.Content: After reading all the reviews on this tv, i went ahead and purchased it. It is a great tv for the bedroom area. Its beautiful and the picture and sound are great! I trust amazon reviews on everything I buy.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth K Anderson
Reviews.Content: I am not an electronics expert, so there will be no technical stuff in this review.  I got this for my bedroom to watch occasionally, the news in the morning or whatever.  It is great.  The picture looks very good and the sound is good too.  I am pleased with it.  It was also easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Almost Very Good
Reviews.Author: JME
Reviews.Content: This little television works well.  I use the HDMI and tuner.  One quirk: Our local cable company puts HD Content on channels above 66 and even without a cable box I can normally tune in all the local digital channels.  The tuner in this television doesn't find anything in the 69.x band so several channels that other televisions can receive on the cable feed are missing.I don't believe any flat screen television has good audio.  This one is no exception.  I would recommend this television for a small desk tv.  You can use the HDMI for a computer but, not having tried it, I can't report the resolution.

Reviews.Title: Did an OK job
Reviews.Author: Martin J. Blumenthal
Reviews.Content: It worked satisfactorily for about 10 days, then it went completely blank. I returned it for a replacement. Hopefully this one will last and the first one was just a fluke.For the money I say it is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Bekah
Reviews.Content: Bought 3 of them for my kids at Christmas and they work great. Just right size for a kids room and easily fits on most dressers or wall mount

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: KAREN ANGLES
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV for our sons to play X-Box 360 on.  It has a great picture and sound.  This is a nice little TV for under $150.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy "China', Buy "USA"
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: First time owner of a Vizio.  Immensely pleased with the ease of setup and the sharpness and resolution of the picture.  Own two other different brands of TVs in my house - next time I need to  replace one of them, it'll also be with a Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!
Reviews.Author: dclodfe
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV! Sharp color and just the right size. Fits on the kitchen counter top just perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great television if you don't mind the size
Reviews.Author: Benjamin A Davis
Reviews.Content: After having a huge box-set TV since college, I needed a TV for my bedroom. This was in my price-range and the HD was a bonus. It's not like the size is a mystery since it is listed at 19-inches, but it really is like Michael Scott's infamous TV from "The Dinner Party." As long as you know that before purchasing, you shouldn't have any issues with it.Good picture, Good sound, easy set up.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for small rooms
Reviews.Author: mrldcty "mrldcty"
Reviews.Content: Installed the tv in the kitchen to replace a counter hogging tube tv.  Huge improvement.  Picture clarity, colors, and sound exceeded my expectations.I would recommend to anyone seeking a compact tv.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 19 inch TV
Reviews.Author: H
Reviews.Content: Great replacement for my 13 inch old analog TV with a converter box that I had in the kitchen.  Takes less counter space and has a bigger picture, happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Yes, I would recommend it.
Reviews.Author: John Kidder
Reviews.Content: I think I finally got a good deal. I'm not a purist, so the speakers seem fine to me and the picture is sharp and clear. I put this on a counter in the kitchen and watch it every morning with coffee. The price was great, shipping was very quick and I couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: Allan Krezminski
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the bedroom and use it to pickup local digital OTA channels. For the price, I think both the picture and sound offer decent quality. In fact, given its relatively small size, I think the stereo sound is above average.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: osage116
Reviews.Content: The Vizio 19-inch unit was just the size we need for the location.  The picture quality is excellent and so far (1 month) the unit has performed well.  The only short coming is the sound quality.  It is clear, but not tonally correct.  The speakers in my laptop computer sound better and are smaller.  We haven't gotten around to trying the other features.  The picture album viewer is something we want to try, just have to put together an album.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: judith d. davis-kovats
Reviews.Content: I really like this tv-- picture is good, easy to set up, speakers are in the front for good sound quality

Reviews.Title: Visio 22" tv
Reviews.Author: mikedfe
Reviews.Content: This was a great tv with an excellent price. Had this shipped they amazon prime and everything was great. The tv turns on quickly with no lag and has a clear sharp picture. The remote works well and the tv comes ready to plug in and watch. The only downside at all was that it shipped in its retail box thru ups and if they had left it, it would have been a tv sitting on my porch. But the tv works great and gets 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Brown eyes
Reviews.Content: I have nothing to complain about this TV.  It has been great rut out of the box.  Crystal clear picture and very slim.

Reviews.Title: I couldn't be happier.
Reviews.Author: Karen "loves to read"
Reviews.Content: Nice tv for the price. Picture is good and sound is good. I am using it in a bedroom so I didn't need extra speakers.

Reviews.Title: Kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: S. R. Schnur "srschnur"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to put atop my kitchen cabinets.  This means it must have a good remote, and it does.  It has a very bright clear picture.  There is one disadvantage to putting it high.  The TV leans slightly backward.  The viewing angle from slightly below makes the picture hard to see because of the nature of LED TVs which need the viewer to be right in front.  This means also, I had to stand on a stool to be able to see to use the menu while I was setting it up.We put a ruler under the back edge of the stand in order to straighten the TV up a little, but it would definitely work better on a table at eye height.  My kitchen is very bright so it is good to have the ambient light setting.  I am living with the imperfect picture because I mainly listen while cooking, and, if there is something I want to see, I can back up to see it.

Reviews.Title: vizio quality
Reviews.Author: Gregory P. Horton "gungho22"
Reviews.Content: perfect size for my daughters armoir and she luvs it. the value for the quality is a good balance. ty

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Will Joe Knighten
Reviews.Content: Picture is good, and the TV is the right size for the bathroom area. While the sound is not all that great, it is OK for the small area.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping and good quality.
Reviews.Author: Onnie9
Reviews.Content: This was shipped extremely fast and I have always had a good experience with VIZIO televisions.  It's a small tv, but works perfect for what I wanted it for.

Reviews.Title: Vizio
Reviews.Author: ella shaw
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on other people's recomendations and I myself love it. The picture and sound are excellent for such an inexpensive set.

Reviews.Title: Color difficult to adjust
Reviews.Author: R. Vis "SFBart"
Reviews.Content: There is an adjustment page for color, but I never could adjust it to my satisfaction. Otherwise it is a good set and it was what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Hyrax
Reviews.Content: The sound is subpar, but everything else is amazing. Had major shipping issues with FedEx.  Amazon went above and beyond to rectify the problem.  Gives a piece of mind ordering products like this.

Reviews.Title: MY GIRLFRIEND LOVES THE TV
Reviews.Author: Patrick Marciano Patrick marciano
Reviews.Content: IT IS A GREAT TV WOULD RECOMENED TO A FRIEND, FAMILY MEMBER, BUSINESS ASSOCIATE ETC, ALSO I ENJOY IT MYSELF

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: T. Justen
Reviews.Content: My only complaint is that the TV was shipped without any additional protection. I was surprised it didn't break. Other than that this is a good picture and sound quality is acceptable.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 19" LED LCD
Reviews.Author: J. A. Minch
Reviews.Content: Purchase it to replace a 15 yr. old 13" kitchen TV.  Very nice, easy to set up, and very good picture.  Very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Vizio 19 inch
Reviews.Author: Rick McElwain
Reviews.Content: Met our expectations.  Good TV for the price.  The sound is good and picture quality very good.  We are happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Love the 19" TV.
Reviews.Author: Debora k.
