Reviews.Content: The size is perfect for the kitchen counter.  The base is very stable, so it won't ever get knocked down.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for bedroom
Reviews.Author: Katherine Wilson "Visalia MOM"
Reviews.Content: This TV was perfect for my bedroom ,small enough so its not bulky but yet it has a good picture

Reviews.Title: great picture - even better price
Reviews.Author: Andrew Peters
Reviews.Content: Great TV for bedroom to watch news. takes up no space on dresser. picks up 39 HD channels over the air

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: This is our second Vizio, and won't be our last. We love both. The clarity is GREAT. We would definitely recommend this brand.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Jack Lapaglia
Reviews.Content: perfect for the bedroom. hung it on the wall with no problem,with the wall mounts i also purchaced. should have done this last year

Reviews.Title: Top Of The Line HD TV
Reviews.Author: Stevie
Reviews.Content: It was out standing . Wonderful picture and audio . When I want to change the settings of it -it is so easy to do . 1080 p and some HD tvs have 750 p . I have no complaints about this tv  Everything that is written about this tv is the absolute truth.If I had the money I would buy the 40" tv by Vizio .

Reviews.Title: Great little T.V. , perfect for a bedroom!
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: I purchased this t.v. as a gift for my daughter's bedroom (and the first wall mount suggested above) and it's a realky nice T.V. The picture is excellent (I just watched Bat Man D.N.R and was very impressed with the quality, remote functions, and ease of use). Highly recommend; great t.v. AND GREAT PRICE!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Linda Hutchinson "say it like it is"
Reviews.Content: Small and light but the picture is great - so crisp and clear. I purchased this for my son's room so he could play Xbox and I could have my TV back but now I am thinking I need one for my room. It is fantastic and the price is perfect!

Reviews.Title: Don't sleep on the Vizio
Reviews.Author: Cuppycakes808
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv, we got it for my daughters room for Christmas. The picture is great and so is the sound quality. There was no assembly. She likes it so we love it. 19 inches is a little smaller than we thought, so we will probably end up getting her a bigger television and putting this one in the bathroom.

Reviews.Title: Nice Television Set at a Great Price!
Reviews.Author: skkirtley
Reviews.Content: This television was a Christmas present for my mother-n-law and it was very easy to set up and has a good picture and the sound quality is great.  The price was awesome and a really good deal.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO TV
Reviews.Author: susan gilbert
Reviews.Content: This is my third Vizio TV purchase.  I had previously purchased this same TV for my grandsons bedrooms (2) and then I was in need of a new one for myself and purchased another.  The color is good and image very sharp.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Ralph H. Nordlund
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture, sound.  The remote control is a bit too small, however.  One must be very careful when hitting, say, channel 3 that it does not register 3333, etc.

Reviews.Title: A Beautiful Picture
Reviews.Author: Angeline Davis
Reviews.Content: I bought this televison for my daughter' s bedroom. I had read some of the reviews and was kind of skeptical about making the purchase. I"m so happy that I did! The picture is so sharp and beautiful and there is no problem at all with the sound. It was also so simple to set up, my twelve year old set it up. The thinness of the television is great because it doesn't take up much space. I would definitely recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Great price for a kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: Russell Moker "Russell"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace the aging analog TV in the kitchen.  It's hooked up to a Roku box and works very well.  I have a lot of confidence in the Vizio name.  Excellent picture and easily viewed from all points in our large kitchen.  Excellent value for the money.  A quality small TV.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied with this small TV for Kitchen
Reviews.Author: E Nickel
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a small television with mounting options to have in our kitchen and this met our needs.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E22-inch
Reviews.Author: Mark Harris
Reviews.Content: Using this TV for a computer monitor, It is the perfect size for this use both, screen size and fit to the available space on the desktop.

Reviews.Title: Good tv for small area.
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: Great picture and works awesome. The only draw back is TV doesn't have the red, white, and yellow connectors to input dvd or something else. Had to buy a new dvd player to hook up to it. Has HD hook ups, so if you are looking for great little HD tv this is it.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 22 inch
Reviews.Author: Lori DeFazio
Reviews.Content: Nice Tv for the price...started out to be bedroom Tv, but is in kitchen now.  Sound does need sound bar, but for kitchen...food network, news viewing it is PERFECT.  Took 5 mins. to install.  Very easy..the only thing had to reset the screen options because out of the package picture was very dark.  Once adjusted it is very nice.

Reviews.Title: Over my expectation...
Reviews.Author: Ric
Reviews.Content: At this price, we realy never think it will be a realy nice product.  Easy configuration.. realy easy . Very good sound for this size of TV.  A lot better than any other tv before.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: slimtree
Reviews.Content: Crisp, clear image.  Great for a small TV. Light weight and easy to move. Vizio is a great brand to purchase.

Reviews.Title: This is a fabulous TV for the money ~ Vizio knows how to do it right
Reviews.Author: Expressed Reviews "Expressed Reviews"
Reviews.Content: For the life of me, I can't understand how anyone wouldn't be more than satisfied with this TV. We purchased it for our kitchen and are delighted with every aspect of it. For those who complain about the sound quality, please keep in mind that this isn't a huge TV designed to deliver premium sound. It's a TV to be used in small places. With that said, the sound is perfectly clear to me, and the picture couldn't be any better. In order to view the picture at its best, you should place the TV at close to eye level. If you view the picture while standing in the kitchen and the TV is about 3 feet lower than eye level, you'll notice some drop off in color saturation. I suspect this would be the case with any TV. When viewed straight on, or slightly off from straight on, the picture is as rich and brilliant as I've seen on any TV, regardless of size. We use this TV a lot while watching the evening news during dinner. The TV is located on a stand at the far end of the kitchen table, so we're viewing it straight on, from about 5-6 feet away. I have to say that the picture is absolutely perfect, providing crystal clear and fully saturated images. The sound is equally clear and is as good as you'll get in a small TV. We do have this TV connected to an HD cable box, so that contributes to the fabulous picture that we receive. The bottom line is that this TV is exceptional in every way. I highly recommend it and give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Joan E. Ahrens "HDTV Viewer"
Reviews.Content: We got it for the kitchen and it fits perfectly.  It was easy to hook up and the picture quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E191VA TV
Reviews.Author: O. Farrell "Happy Camper"
Reviews.Content: Needed a small tv for the kitchen shelf and this was just the right size.Did some research and for the price this tv was the best choice for me.Have had it for two weeks and so far I am completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: dan no evil
Reviews.Content: GREAT  pictur and quality, smart purchase. what else can I say? I'm trying to fit more words. three more words

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Suzanne217
Reviews.Content: Love it... a great purchase. Perfect for my bedroom! Picture and sound are great for a small tv. I bought the mount and easily installed it myself.

Reviews.Title: She loves it.
Reviews.Author: Jodie
Reviews.Content: This was given to a friend as a gift.  She is very happy with it and I have heard no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Good product!
Reviews.Author: Tony Schmitz
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my mom. She is really enjoying it. The picture is very clear and vivid. 22 inches is a little smaller than we expected. But, it fits nicely on her table.

Reviews.Title: Good small television
Reviews.Author: dennis long
Reviews.Content: This Vizio television fulfills the need for a small television requirement. It has an attractive  appearance without the usual pedestal stand. The only real drawback is the inability to adjust bass and treble.

Reviews.Title: Just a couple observations
Reviews.Author: Michael Tree "2 many hobbies"
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of reviews here before buying, and this is my first flat screen, although I have seen other flat screens, the picture seems great to me.  The one I bought is the E221VA.To address a couple things I read in the reviews...Sound- Of course, if you have been listening to an old CRT TV with a big speaker, this one will not be anywhere near that size, and although they make higher quality speakers in small sizes, they are expensive, so for what I paid for this, the speakers are as good as I would expect.  They are very adjustable as well with the on screen menu, and there are two of them, stereo, I can see them through the small grill, they are oval shaped and about 3.5 inches by 1.5 inches.  Frankly, sound is compromised for aesthetics, larger speakers would mean having a place to put them.  As it is, they are partially obscured as well by the grill and screen frame, so the space for the speaker at the bottom is even smaller than the speaker itself.  But as I said, it is as good as expected, and sitting fairly close to a TV of this size, within six feet, it isn't something that is bothersome.  I do notice when I get further away from it without raising the volume, it does sound tinny compared to the old CRT TV I had before.Adjusting the Color- The color is adjustable, what might be confusing to some is there are six or seven presets to choose from, one of them says custom.  On custom you can change all the usual things.  I suggest downloading the manual before buying anything like this, which is what I did.  What I did was choose the custom setting which I thought looked best, then when you move to custom, it starts at the preset settings, so you can adjust it.  Frankly, on HD, it looked great right out of the box, it is when on a 480-line signal that the adjustment becomes an issue.Overall, quite happy with this, it was about $20 more than a computer monitor of this size, but has a TV tuner included.The only thing that cries for improvement, in my opinion, is the remote, no light and very tiny lettering on the buttons, but only because I have had better ones, not a big issue once you memorize the oft used buttons.  But thin and black, so will try to escape to the couch cushions whenever it gets the chance.

Reviews.Title: another great Visio product
Reviews.Author: Jeff M. "advertising"
Reviews.Content: We have 5 Visio TV's ranging from this 22" to our larger 49". They all work great. We have Fios and the combination of Fios and these TV's makes for a fantastic viewing experience. Next we intend to get a 55" or larger and will stick with the Visio's.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, poor warranty registration process
Reviews.Author: Allan D. Dale
Reviews.Content: The product (19" flat screen LCD TV) is excellent, no negative issues at all, but the on-line warranty registration process is very, very difiicult.  It is complicated to get to the warranty site, then the required information from the info label on the back of the TV is so tiny that I had to use a high intensity light and a magnifying glass to read the information. Even then I'm stillnot sure that one number of the serial number was 6 or 8 (I guessed 6).  If not for the horror of on-line registration I would rate the TV as a 5.

Reviews.Title: If you don't need a monster of a TV, Buy this
Reviews.Author: Joseph H. Reese "Necrowpharaoh"
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv set up as my computer monitor via HDMI for the past month, and I've got to say, it has surpassed all of my expectations thus far.Picture quality is great after some fine tuning, No flicker and great resolution on 1080p blue rays.My ONLY complaint, and it's not a deal breaker for me, is that the headphone jack gives some white noise at all times, I don't know what the deal is...

Reviews.Title: Very good kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: BRH
Reviews.Content: Pros: The TV arrived right on schedule.  We had absolutely no trouble at all setting up the base.  After significant adjustments, we have a good picture.  Fits very well in a small space under a cabinet and viewing angles are fine.Cons: The TV comes only with set-up instructions.  You can get the online manual for more info (which we needed for adjustment since many of the settings are not intuitive).  Our other TVs have CC when mute -- this TV doesn't and it would be nice if it did.Neutral. The audio is okay -- just okay.  The remote is okay -- but it could certainly be improved (most of the buttons are identical -- shouldn't be)We haven't had this TV long enough to comment on its durability.

Reviews.Title: Visio review
Reviews.Author: Robert T
Reviews.Content: The television arrived sooner than expected and in good condition.  We have only used it for a few days, but so far it is an excellent television. It is easy to use ,even though it had limited directions. It has a great picture , clear with bright colors.

Reviews.Title: Very nice 22' Vizio T.V.
Reviews.Author: MuayThaiGermanFighter "MuayThaiGermanFighter"
Reviews.Content: I must say this t.v. is very good for the price.Pros1.It has a very clear HD picture.2.the thinness of it is very nice,not like some other t,v.'s where it is thick and poke out.3.the price can't be beaten....I had got it for 132.00 with free shipping.it was 200 but I waiting until it when down and I had to get it.Cons1.the sound of the t.v isn't the best.(but I have a sound bar and that will fix the problem.2.the remote is ugly,my other Vizio tv the remote is nice & thin.Overall the tv does what it should and it is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Sound is terrible!
Reviews.Author: Glenn Lewis
Reviews.Content: The picture is great, but the sound is terrible, as if it were being projected into a metal bucket - hollow and tinny.  The audio controls do little to negate this effect.  If the sound is not important, this is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the money!
Reviews.Author: rose
Reviews.Content: It is getting increasingly difficult to find small tvs these days. I needed to replace one in a small guest room, so  I ordered one. It arrived the next day, and in minutes I had it set up. It is the perfect size for the space, and the picture quality and sound are as good as any others. I was so impressed with this little tv that I immediately ordered another one for my office, which arrived today and is already set up. Thanks, Amazon

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Nick LeBreaux
Reviews.Content: I am using this TV wall mounted in kitchen / dining area. It is used mostly as a security camera monitor but also used as regular TV some of the time.  Works great and I am well pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: great picture........great price!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Santillo
Reviews.Content: also great sound quality! fifteen, fourteen, thirteen, twelve, eleven, ten, nine, eight, seven, six, five, four, three, two, one, zero.

Reviews.Title: simple viewing
Reviews.Author: gennaro
Reviews.Content: Cant beat the price nice table top viewing  .perfect for nursing homes or any place where you may have limited space.

Reviews.Title: nice Little tv
Reviews.Author: Elliott S. Jacks "Elliott"
Reviews.Content: this vizio is nice Looking,made pretty solid,picture quality is good and sound quality is excellent for a tv this small,i did however return this for a larger 24 inch E241-A1 which came DOA ! most likely because Amazon did not double box and UPS people throw things around like its a frisbee ! or i happened to pick a rotten apple from the factory,maybe i will reorder if i see many good review otherwise i go Panasonic

Reviews.Title: Vizio 22 inch
Reviews.Author: Wandoo
Reviews.Content: The product arrived timely and is a good size for what I brought it for.  The only complaint I have is that the audio is not very good at all and sounds a little distorted.  Overall a good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great Small TV
Reviews.Author: PrimeTime "Book Lover"
Reviews.Content: We chose this 19" Vizio HDTV to use in a small kitchen/dining area.  Excellent picture, excellent audio.Amazon's price and fast delivery sealed the deal since we had already seen what quality Vizio offers in smallTV sets.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV with one flaw
Reviews.Author: S. Wong
Reviews.Content: It's a decent TV.  My only complaint is that the viewing angle is too narrow especially vertically.  I have this TV on a built in TV shelf in my kitchen and I don't have a good view of it unless I am at least 12 to 15 feet away.  If I am any closer  the picture seems very dark.

Reviews.Title: Is this a new TV
Reviews.Author: Ron O.
Reviews.Content: The TV was not in factory packaging but In a plain cardboard box. It works well but I wonder if it was new.

Reviews.Title: Time Lapse
Reviews.Author: Issy
Reviews.Content: The time it takes for the picture to appear once the remote button is pressed is unacceptable.  The remote needs to be redesigned, so it would be easier to use remote options. Example: timer on remote needs to be a button of its own and not have to go to several steps in order to engage the timer. From owning other brand name TV's,  this one I would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Electronic Technician
Reviews.Author: John M. Szczepaniak "John"
Reviews.Content: I bought it mainly as a computer display and for that use it is ok. The wireless remote only worked if I used it within 2 feet of the front and would not be good for armchair viewing. The control buttons are almost flush to the case on the right side makes it harder to use without a decent remote.It has a good picture but use is handicapped by the poor design of controls.

Reviews.Title: vizio e-191va 19-inchy 60hz led lcd class edge lit razor HDTV black
Reviews.Author: ALEJANDRA MAGUDDATO
Reviews.Content: too small, was used for my bedroom - color not that good, need binoculars to see it from my bed. wished i could have returned it for a bigger screen, but smart me - threw away the box. I've learned my lesson!

Reviews.Title: VIZIO 19" TV
Reviews.Author: Mike M.
Reviews.Content: I like the TV but the the channel display is very small and barely readable. Other than that, it is a good TV.

Reviews.Title: Poor Viewing angles
Reviews.Author: roger white
Reviews.Content: I purchased this LED 22 inch tv for my RV, in which it is positioned high up on a shelf over the dinette. I ordered this tv because of its advertised vertical viewing angle. However when viewing the tv while seated in the dinette the picture quality was very poor. The tv did not have the vertical viewing angle that was advertised. Returned this product and purchased an Insignia 24 inch, LCD tv from Best Buy which had a far superior picture, and a better price.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Juilliard "Viola Player"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter's small apartment. It was a good size for the limited space available. She watches mostly streamed movies and videos on it and has been very satisfied. She didn't feel, as some other reviewers mentioned, that the picture was too dark. She's had no complaints about sound (and she is a professional musician for whom sound would matter) Excellent choice for someone on a limited budget.

Reviews.Title: Sound and picture are OK.
Reviews.Author: L. Wedding
Reviews.Content: Sound is very tinny and picture color is sort of washed out for a new LED TV.  I would not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: good product and value
Reviews.Author: Neil F. Katz "Other Guy"
Reviews.Content: fine picture and sound --- reasonable price --- only knock is that it automatically picked up every channel in the universe causing me to spend a bunch of time deleting out those I didn't want ... and even given the deletions, can't get to the HD channels directly because the regular channels [deleted] still appear when their number is entered -- requires one more click to get to the HD channel --- annoying but not a big deal

Reviews.Title: Vizio 22 TV
Reviews.Author: Bob Fritch
Reviews.Content: The picture is not as crisp and clear as I would have thougth  Its under a counter so the seelction was limited  I wanted a Sharp, but they no longer have in the 22" size

Reviews.Title: Extremely poor sound
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: I should have listened to the reviewers who complained about the sound quality of this TV.  It was tinny and grating.  We tried it for 2 days and then decided that it was just too annoying to keep the TV.  The picture was sharp and clear but a bit washed out.  We didn't try to adjust the color since we were returning the set, so I can't say whether it would have adjusted to a brighter picture.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy VIZIO E221VA TV
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: This Vizio TV had a muffled sound and the picture quality was POOR.  Also, I experienced an Out of the Box failure....the remote control would not work.  The infrared light on the remote was not functioning.I returned it for a refund  - do not buy

Reviews.Title: not worth it and not needed for security cameras
Reviews.Author: William Messick
Reviews.Content: poor quality and functionality... Recommend not buying this for any reason at all, it doesn't help or support the security of a home or business, not practical in the least.

Reviews.Title: pix very dark
Reviews.Author: Semyon Altshuler "Shopers"
Reviews.Content: Delivery was fast.Very bad pix ,to  dark, brightness 100 steel no good and color terible.Suppose  be HD but not even close to any standart. My last Vizio Next time maybeSumsung or Sony.

Reviews.Title: OK,  if you like a green tint.
Reviews.Author: hike sedona "hikesedona"
Reviews.Content: Now  I know why they have a frog displayed on the  screen ... this was to replace a Panasonic TV we have in the kitchen (that  worked fine except an  older model that took  up too  much counter space).  In any event this Vizio takes up  less counter space and  picture  OK if you like green people!  No  way to  adjust  color so I guess we'll stick with the  excellent picture  on the  Panasonic and create a bit more  space for  it  on the counter.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE speakers, & a CRAPPY picture DO NOT BUY!!!
Reviews.Author: T.
Reviews.Content: This TV was purchased from Amazon.com, for only $78, due to Cyber Monday discounts, and a $50 credit for opening an Amazon Visa account. It's NOT EVEN WORTH $78! It's a POS, pure and simple. The WORST looking display, and the WORST sound, I've ever encountered. NOT BUY ONE!!!I read most of the reviews on the TV set. Some people said the speakers were poor, while other people said they were OK. I expected that the speakers would be average or at least tolerable. I was wrong: they are awful. Cheap low bid Chinese garbage, would be my bet, for ALL the components.They sound like you are listening to a 1960's 9 volt battery operated transistor radio, that is inside a large, deep, narrow metal can; well two of them. These speakers are just UNBELIEVABLY BAD. And, there is no redemption from the so called 'equalizer'. I spent 45 minutes, trying to get something resembling decent sound out of the POS speakers. I just couldn't 'adjust' the sound to anything I would actually want to listen to. The sound booms, if you turn it up, and it sounds hollow. It's hard to understand the dialogue, it sounds muddy. The speakers are just plain garbage, and they sound horrible.And the picture. How did Vizio manage to make a picture SO UNBELIEVABLY BAD? Low bid Chinese slave labor LCD display? I spent more then TWO HOURS trying to get flesh tones to look like something other than a dead zombie, while trying to retain reasonably decent background colors. It is simply impossible. You want reds to be red, greens to be green, blues to be blue, flesh tones to look real, and yellows to be yellow? Well, you won't get it from this POC TV set. Pick **TWO** out of the FIVE, and you MIGHT GET THEM. Or not.Sometimes, I could only get **ONE** of the FIVE, to look good. And the 'resolution' looks like an old, worn out VHS tape. I kept hoping there was a 'focus' parameter I could adjust. There isn't. The picture is REALLY REALLY BAD. Horrible color, with VERY poor resolution. There is nothing, no redeeming qualities at all. Low price?? Well, you certainly get LESS than what you pay for, no matter HOW cheap it is.Don't waste your money on this. Oh yes: it doesn't even come with an instruction manual, just a 'quick start guide'. Unbelievable. I guess a few pieces of paper, to tell you how to USE the TV, would have cut too much into Visio's profits. What would an instruction manual cost, printed in bulk, in China? Twenty cents per TV set? Thirty cents? Wow, all that money. Can you imagine some senior citizen TRYING to set up this TV set, with no instruction manual? Yeah: it wouldn't be funny, at all. Buy some other TV. ANY other TV. There is no place to go, but up.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Nom De Plum
Reviews.Content: I have only had this TV three weeks.Let me tell you I love, love, love the aesthetic design of this set. Unfortunately it has been nothing but problems since day one. There is a photo mode on this TV which week one I accidentally went into and then when I went to change the input back to what I had it on the TV would only show in black in white. Fast forward two weeks later, my roommate figures out that you have to actually press the exit button to back out of the Photo Mode because otherwise the programming still thinks it is in that mode. The set has some sort of build in auto tuner for ambient lighting and the picture flickered so much that I had to turn this feature off. In fact I turned all of these features off and it still flickers (just not as bad). I contacted Vizio because I bought it directly from them and they would not help me via email. They said that I had to call customer service. Well yeah right. From the horror stories I have read online, no thanks. I have it to a point where its watchable and the flickering is only a minor annoyance but for a tv that's only three weeks old this is pretty much unacceptable. Word to the wise, don't buy from Vizio; this company is no longer what it was.

Reviews.Title: This television is poorly crafted.
Reviews.Author: Amanda Lones
Reviews.Content: Okay, let me first start about by saying this, I have yet to even USE this television, so I will not be reviewing quality of picture or sound. This television is sort of a standard HDTV in that it has the screen itself and a base which the consumer must attach. This base and the bottom of the screen where they are supposed to come together are the most poorly crafted pieces of equipment I have EVER touched. The base itself requires multiple people to even think about putting it on, it is supposed to slide on, however this is not even an option. They have screw holes on both sides so you might be thinking "Why don't I just screw it together?" Great question, here is a simple answer: There is a metal plate stopping you from putting it together that way. Overall just the assembly of this television is not worth the price. I will update should I ever get this thing together, but heed my words, this is the worst television I have ever purchased by far.
